Today in Caithness, it's looking solid with 6 ft @10s W swell and fresh 15 mph WSW winds. Best spots include Point of Ness and Murkle Point, both working well during the morning and into the afternoon. Tomorrow, conditions remain similar with 6 ft @10s W swell but winds shift to 17 mph S, keeping it fun at the same locations. On day three, expect a slight increase in period to 12s, still 6 ft, with 18 mph SW winds, making for a lively surf day. Best: today.
